page.title: 08TRADE IN TODDINGTON
page.content: Toddington is a fairly small{trade centre. The majority of people do their main shopping either in Flitwick or Luton. The village has a wide variety of small shops. There are 3 food shops,2 sweet shops, a bakers, a greengrocers, a hardware store, a wool shop, a furniture store, a chemists, a haberdashers, a florists, a newsagents which provides the local newspaper delivery service. Other shops provide services for the villagers such as the two garages, the two hairdressers, the launderette, the opticians and three estate agents. There are also four building societies, one bank and a Post Office. {Although Toddington}is quite a small place it has 8 Public Houses Alongside these there are 3{take-away hot food {shops}, a Chinese, an Indian and a fish and chip shop.
